price: Tí ó bá jẹ́ pé dájúdájú àwọn onítírà gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, kí wọ́n sì bẹ̀rù (Allāhu), Àwa ìbá pa àwọn àìda wọn rẹ́ fún wọn, Àwa ìbá sì mú wọn wọ inú àwọn Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra.
arabic: وَلَوۡ أَنَّ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّقَوۡاْ لَكَفَّرۡنَا عَنۡهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمۡ وَلَأَدۡخَلۡنَٰهُمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walaw anna ahla al-kitābi āmanū wa-ittaqaw lakaffarnā ʿanhum sayyiātihim wala-adkhalnāhum jannāti al-naʿīmi
translations: and surely We (would have) admitted them
